course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Geotechnical Analysis and Design
course.description: Introduction to geotechnical analysis and design including slope stability analysis, bearing capacity of soils, lateral earth pressures, design of retaining wall, shallow and piled foundations, geotechnical centrifuge modeling and field monitoring.

reviews.author: shirayuki653
reviews.title: Mediocre
reviews.comment_content:
For the content part, please refer to others comment. It is basically the continuation of 3730. I would like to discuss the appropriacy of the content. In terms of course content, this is a perfect illustration of how well is the course design for the B.Eng. of Asia MIT is. (and sadly you cannot skip it unless you can apply credit transfer)

Most of the civil UG curriculum (in HKU and also research-based universities) will only have the following core courses: engineering geology(CIVL4700, which Asia MIT has omitted in its core), and soil mechanics. Geotechnical design/ foundation engineering are usually provided as electives.  It is hard to follow if a student is not familiar with the basic contents such as pressure diagram, consolidation model and seepage. An attempt to grasp every of the course or else you will go crazy unless you are a genius. The only reason why this course is not ceased to exist is that it covers slope stability, as required by the HKIE. Even though this course has trimmed to suit the expectation for a Year 3/4 student. The course has turned out in a disorganized manner, with the lapping of many theories behind it. Moreover, there are even no grounds for CIEV students taking this course.

TLDR;  Just stick to the lecture notes and get familiar with the questions so that you can survive with the course. Don't expect you will learn much after course completion, even it is content-rich in the first glance.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Ni is a new professor, after the revision of the course notes last year the notes contain fewer errors and more reader friendly. His notes are clear enough so that you can read the steps thoroughly and understand what is going on, even though the contents are troublesome.

Albeit his teaching is unattractive, he can point out the key points on solving the problem. Once you are in the lecture, you can realize that he is going to instil something new to you, rather than merely showing off their competency in a specific discipline.
reviews.comment_grading:
Quite good, mean grades will turn out a B this year. (According to unofficial statistics about 30% of students will be given an A range for 3730 and 3740 on average)

Here are some statistics:
MT (30%) : mean 36/100, SD 13
Final(60%)  mean 81/120, SD not released

Me:MT 52,Final 105 >>A
My friend:MT 28, Final 101>>B+
reviews.comment_workload:
Reasonable for a CIVL course, at least no attendance is required. There would be an assignment with 2-3 questions for each chapter, due 2 weeks after release.

Both MT and final are open book, MT covers chapter 1-3 and final covers chapter 4-6.

reviews.author: ljdjlalb
reviews.title: Review to 3740
reviews.comment_content:
It talks about fundamental design procedure for retaining wall, ELS, shallow foundation and pile design.

In fact, the contents are shallow. However, you can't expect professors who are specialised in conducting research to coach you about real world practices.

So, if you found geo interesting goes print out the relevent geoguide and scan through the lines (but dont dig too far)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
26/7/2023 update
The content taught in pile part is shallow.
Interested in pile design shall read through geo publication 1/2006.
In the publication, lateral loading, settlement analysis, wave anlysis, pile behaviour during drilling/jacking will be discussed.
Hopefully, the course will be more in depth in the future.
Nevertheless, it would be great if the course can include insights on utilizing existing retaining strucutre/pile for the extension/new structures.
reviews.comment_grading:
Exam questions are easier than those hw questions. As long as you have thorough understanding in hw solution, you are fine with the exam (at least B range lah).

The exam questions only assess if you do a thorough revision but I think most of the class disappoint the professor

Would say real world designs are far complicated than you expect.
e.g.  inhomogeneity

reviews.author: ettk
reviews.comment_content:
一開頭教active passive earth pressure 其實就係之後果幾課嘅fundamental 所以要學好啲
之後就係retaining wall ELS foundation (shallow+deep) 最後就係slope
除咗第一課earth pressure會同其他有關之外 其實每科之間都唔係咁相關 可以當係separate咁讀 而每課都係跟code代下數咁 其實又唔係話好難 不過就content比較多同亂
reviews.comment_teaching: 後生嘅 所以上堂都係識得教重點 然後考試之前都會比tips overall都算係friendly嘅 唯獨係mainland嘅關係 佢啲英文口音比較重 聽起上嚟需要啲時間適應
reviews.comment_grading: 我覺得以CIVL required course嚟講算唔錯嘅 但係佢啲stat唔係太公開 都冇得作準
reviews.comment_workload:
合理嘅 六份功課 (每課完咗有一份 大約3-4題) midterm加final
每份功課基本上係2-3個鐘可以搞得掂

reviews.author: NCTROLL
reviews.title: About Design of Geotechnical Structures
reviews.comment_content:
The course content is classified into 8 chapters.
Chapter:
1 - Basic theories of geotech struct design, eg Rankine's theory and Coulomb's theory
2 - Design of retaining wall, such as gravity wall and cantilever wall. The problem arising from pore water distribution between both sides of the wall and soil arching are also covered.
3 - Design of temporary support for excavation. Important topics include braced-cut, heaving of clay as well as soil swelling.
4 - Shallow foundation design. The factor of safety is the key for this chapter. The calculation part mainly depends on reading the values from graph.
5 - Deep foundation design. The pile driven into sand, clay and rock will be discussed. Bearing capacity and shearing resistance will be important.
6 - Slope stability. Again, factor of safety is the key for this chapter. You have to understand the proof in order to master this chapter.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Notes are substantial for you to revise the exam even if you do not attend any classes.
Prof Ni is nice and willing to answer your question in prompt. Although his classes may be a bit boring, you will learn more by attending his classes.
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grade. As the other mentioned before, the mean grade should be around B.
Stats:
Assignment(10%): Basically everyone got full mark
MT (30%) : mean 36.57/100, my score 53/100
Final(60%)  mean 81.56/120, my score 104/100
Grade: A
reviews.comment_workload:
Only 6 assignments in total (the last assignment does not count towards the final grade). Each assignment carry 2 - 3 questions.
Attendance is not required this semester.

reviews.author: MrEdward
reviews.title: Geotechnical Analysis and Design
reviews.comment_content: Main topics include lateral earth pressure, retaining wall design, excavation support, shallow foundation, deep foundation, slope stability analysis and reinforced structures(not examined).
reviews.comment_teaching: Since some concepts are rather complicated to understand when you  are the first time to listen to, lecture videos are provided that really help especially many students are busy in that semester. He is willing to answer questions after class and there are also reviews session before the midterm and final. He is a good professor !
reviews.comment_grading:
Qualitative and quantitative reasoning are both important in the midterm and final, and the questions are not intended to trick you but just to test how well you understand the concepts and how familiar you are with the topics.

In general, the grading is lenient. Most people got a high score in the midterm, so the final is much more important.
Personally, my midterm is close to 90% while the final is unknown.
Final grade: A+
reviews.comment_workload:
5 to 6 assignments with 1 midterm and final. No group project. The workload is manageable.

This is a fundamental course so just try your best regardless of the disciplines you are in.

reviews.author: Ivan01234
reviews.title: Geotechnical Analysis and Design
reviews.comment_content:
1. Lateral Earth Pressure
2. Design the Retaining Wall
3. Braced Cuts or Multi-prop Excavations
4. Shallow Foundation
5. Deep Foundation
6. Slope Stability
7. Reinforced Earth Structures (extra material)
Lecture video will be provided for each chapter.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The professor is kind and willing to answer the students' questions. Although he has a strong accent, it is easy to follow after you used to it. Each lesson will be video tapped for student who are not attending the class.
He is a good professor.
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework: 10%
Midterm: 30%
Final: 50%
Personal Result:
Full mark in homework
80% in midterm (mean:70/100 sd:16)
unknown result in final
Final grade: A
reviews.comment_workload:
5 homework
1 midterm
1 final
Most of the homework are calculations
Midterm is more about the qualitative questions
Final is more about the quantitative questions

reviews.author: 地方母親
reviews.title: 靚grade course，操卷贏一半
reviews.comment_content:
6個chapter，詳細内容跟其他人啦懶得copy
内容唔算太多，prof每堂開始個陣都會review上一堂d main points
個人覺得ch2,5,6比較難
notes幾好，有example，幾清晰
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof香港人，口音夠親切，入耳好多。講得幾好，每堂都有break，可以趁機問問題，見你香港人會用返中文答。其實算有心，final前特登整個Q&A section比我地翻去問問題。間唔中會有鷄湯聽下。
tutorial 0上，唔知
reviews.comment_grading:
Assignment*5 10% (each 2 %), Midterm 30%, Final 60%
My score:
Assignment: 100*3, 98,97 (mean: average 92-93)
Midterm: 77/100 (highest: 92, uq: 61, mean: 48.7, median: 48, lq: 35, lowest: 10)
Final: 86/100 (highest: 95, uq: 72.63, mean: 61.52, median: 61.5, lq:50, lowest: 19)
final grade: A+
I love u so much Zac
老實講 prof都話mean比想象中低，今次有A+都算好彩
reviews.comment_workload:
少，一個chapter一份功課
5份功課可以跟source，不過最好check下數，d答案有時有錯
midterm final最緊要做paper, cheatsheet得單面，最好將自己背唔到ge theory/ pp步驟抄落去，好過你盲目抄式落去

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 算式好複雜但考試唔難既岩土應用course
reviews.comment_content:

Effective stress, seepage 同埋consolidation既基礎

reviews.comment_teaching:
Dr. Ni 教得一般
講書照讀ppt, 好悶

但個堆proof可以skip

Assignment workload算低

亦可以搵source抄
但要確保抄既同時要明白個原理

reviews.author: SQ Flyer
reviews.title: 沒有不勞而獲：睇書＋讀Code＋操練至上＝好grade
reviews.comment_content:
CIVL3740 係3730 Soil Mechanics 課程延續 基本上3730 最重要的概念例如 Effective Stress, Mohr-Coulomb failure criterion, 2D Seepage 計Flownet, 1D Consolidation 計Settlement 係呢個Course 係貫徹始終 所以務必記得讀熟

3740 重點放係Analysis of geotechnical related structures and applications
e.g. retaining wall, cantilever wall, braced cut excavation & lateral support (ELS), shallow foundations, deep foundations and soil slope

主要有六課 頭三課Midterm 尾三課Final 詳情如下
1. Lateral Earth Pressure
第一課係之後兩課基礎 呢課概念爲主 透過利用泥本身 Vertical Effective Stress Distribution 考慮Soil tendency to move in which side 去揾三款 Earth Pressure Distribution (at rest, passive and active pressure) 當中有Jaky Equation, Rankine theory and Coulomb theory
Assumption 同Proof 務必熟讀

2. Retaining wall
Gravity wall, cantilever wall
基本上Gravity Wall 係呢科用第一課内容做 Analysis 爲主 揾不同FOS (due to overturning, sliding, bearing capacity)
Cantilever Wall 揾Vertical Effective stress and earth pressure distribution on active and passive side 去定斷embedment depth 要幾深
計數部分Step 複雜最好做題練習
概念部分只有Soil arching

3. Braced Cut Lateral Support System
呢課玩Excavation 橫撐支撐 係不同Pressure Envelope 底下每條Strut take幾多load 同moment
概念野講如何計算FOS of the excavation under changing water level, soil liquefaction, soil stiffness & dilatancy 之類

4. Shallow foundation
又係 Analysis 爲主講不同footing 種類係兩種bearing capacity theory (鼎鼎大名Terzaghi & Mayerhof equation) 係general shear failure 底下揾ultimate bearing capacity 有不同assumption 同consideration (under semi-empirical approach) 水位變化對bearing capacity 的影響 同埋FOS, effective area method
代數計算爲主 (contributions from cohesion, vertical stress, unit weight 揾bearing capacity factor with given friction angle, as well as to find other semi empirical factors)

後面個部分就講vertical stress increase under different load type 係不同深度同情況下的變化 有好多不同Theory同Method 計算
之後係為左計Settlement of shallow foundation of soil (elastic, primary and secondary settlement under drained and undrained conditions)

5. Deep Foundation (pile foundation)
呢課有不同Assumptions & approach (total stress/effective stress) 去揾Pile 的toe resistance and shaft resistance under sand/clay/rock
好多都係一堆Experimental 例如透過做field test 揾SPT N60 value 同empirical Approach 代數字去揾兩種resistance 而去揾total ultimate resistance of the pile
同埋Pile Group under single pile or block failure mode 揾Ultimate resistance 分別
呢科suppose 會講多D settlement 計算影響同埋其他不同Pile (driven pile/ H-socket pile)不過又係無講 （HKU有講）
概念野 Negative Skin Friction 同Pile Load Test 同其他proposed empirical method to identify ultimate load and settlement

6. Stability of soil slope
呢課講得好brief  CIVL4710 會有更仔細論述同埋會用到Slope/W  
呢課其實最重要 香港山多平地少 山泥傾瀉頻繁 Soil Slope 的穩定性好重要 唔係會死人（每次都係講 Po Shan Road Landslide 聼到悶) 同埋全世界好多做slope engineering 同mitigation works

呢課主要講不同sliding mechanism 同assumption 去揾FOS　Proof同唔同Assumption係最重要内容 水位改變對FOS改變要識(precipitation, Infiltration, runoff 呢D野又無講) 點樣做slope upgrade 點樣搞泥釘做rigid barrier flexible barrier 呢堆common upgrading works 技術又無教

結論：内容本身吾太悶 不過無深度無太多現實考量 建議自修 吾係就一舊雨暈
想學更多自己睇書讀Code 或者4000 5000 Elective 見
reviews.comment_teaching:
倪均均呢條友仔 我覺得教書好一般 唔係話無心教 而係無特別多Insight同埋對 geotechnical-related design practice
無特別著墨去介紹下出面點做Preliminary design considerations & site investigation 太過跟書教 無太多深度

我指的深度係行業Practice 同一D常見 technical issue 點樣對學生有對個Field 有深刻認識同益處

唔係好似某2510 Chair Prof 穆罕默德招捷達 個種係到自己打飛機 追求純粹超脫 而無人聼得明 又無實際用途的深度
(P.S. 無人會揾渠做FYP 你想比渠搞到飛精煙滅 就去馬)

我地讀CIVIL係講原理同講應用 唔係瘋狂做Mathematical Analysis 啊大佬 即使有D科比較Mathematical Dependent 但到最後都起碼反映現實操作 或者更深入瞭解個種物料的行爲

上堂基本上只係讀slides
copy most content from textbook and very few from Geoguide and code of practices from GEO or BD

都走曬堂自己睇筆記睇書睇Code自修 學得仲多同practical
連睇Video都費事 因爲真係好悶同埋口音好難聽

TA都係净係講下例子同概念感無特別 自己睇熟揾Source睇就得
幾個大陸TA口音真係不得了 有部分Tutorial Notes 只係抄Lecture 内容
reviews.comment_grading:
Assignment 10% (ch1-5)
Midterm 30% (ch1-3) (3 big questions)
Final 60% (ch4-6) (6 big questions)

Midterm in this semester is running out of time for most students because of its complexity in calculation (very chur even I know the ways to solve for most questions), so the mean and SD is quite low. Getting high score in midterm means u will get a good grade.
Tactics: Do fast and draw diagrams fast

Final is much easier, still there are some unfamiliar questions that may appear, but indeed can think of and able to solve if concepts clear.

My score
Assignment 9.85/10
Midterm 67/100, >2.27SD  (Mean 36.57, SD 13.38, Max 93 crazy man)
Prof said follows normal distribution so probably the first few percent of students do pretty well

Final 110/120 (Mean 81.56, Max 117 crazy man, Min 37)

Overall:84.94%
Grade: A+ (confirmed on May 28)
reviews.comment_workload:
Workload 好personal 功課得五份 （最尾個份無計到）每份兩個禮拜時間做 長計算題爲主 難度正常

考試唔係cumulative 同埋Open Book open notes 難度會有所提升 會問concept 同proof 同一堆計數題目 最好事前讀好筆記 睇書做remark 同操下書題目感 唔係考試肯定做得唔夠快

書呢 就睇
Craig Soil Mechanics
Das Foundation Engineering
Peck, Hanson, Thornburn Foundation Engineering
GEO GeoGuide
GEO Slope Manual
BD Foundation Code 或者 GEO Publication 1/2006 之類 裏面大量概念例題 上堂未必感仔細講就自己睇 有部分内容睇書之後考試會出 吾睇就自己傻仔
